attributes.action: Learn how to stand at attention when honouring all those who have made the ultimate sacrifice for our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It could be considered insulting to the memory of those who have died in the service of our country to be represented by someone who cannot be bothered to stand straight and smart for a few brief moments whilst ostensibly honouring their memory. It is particularly inexcusable that this should happen at a time when our country is at war and our troops continue to die on a regular basis.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
